subject: Immigration and Emigration
Hispanic-Americans
Illegal Immigrants
Baseball
Law and Legislation
lead_paragraph: Ozzie Guillen, the manager of the Chicago White Sox, spoke forcefully about Arizona’s much-debated new law, which seeks to crack down on illegal immigrants.
snippet: Ozzie Guillen, the manager of the Chicago White Sox, spoke forcefully about Arizona’s much-debated new law, which seeks to crack down on illegal immigrants.
